UNTIL JAN 23, 3:00 p.m. BERKELEY- Treasurer Bill Lockyer said Saturday that if lawmakers fail to quickly adopt significant budget cuts, the state could be forced to begin issuing IOUs beginning in May. Depending on whether cuts are made soon, we may have to have IOUs go out in May, he said during a luncheon speech at a political seminar.
